node_info.name: executeWorkflowTrigger
node_info.description: Helpers for calling other n8n workflows. Used for designing modular, microservice-like workflows.

properties.name: events
properties.description: When executed by another workflow using Execute Workflow Trigger

properties.displayName: When an ‘execute workflow’ node calls this workflow, the execution starts here. Any data passed into the 'execute workflow' node will be output by this node.
properties.name: notice

properties.displayName: This node is out of date. Please upgrade by removing it and adding a new one
properties.name: outdatedVersionWarning

options.name: Define using JSON example
options.description: Generate a schema from an example JSON object

options.name: Accept all data
options.description: Use all incoming data from the parent workflow

properties.displayName:
Provide an example object to infer fields and their types.
To allow any type for a given field, set the value to null.
properties.name: (template: JSON_EXAMPLE)_notice
name
properties.description: Define expected input fields. If no inputs are provided, all data from the calling workflow will be passed through.

values.name: name
values.description: A unique name for this workflow input, used to reference it from another workflows

values.name: type
values.description: Expected data type for this input value. Determines how this field's values are stored, validated, and displayed.
